page.title: 05Chalfont St.Peter Local News
page.content: {Social Concerns} The editor of a newspaper has the difficult task of putting a weeks news into one issue. At the moment the one complaint that keeps arrising is Terminal 5 at Heathrow.Some people do not want the new terminal as its flight path is right over their houses.{Reactions} Families who have had great losses find it easy to talk to journalists. Working for a newspaper can be a depressing job.The families like more people to hear about their tragic stories. {Attitudes} The newspaper we interviewed writes mainly for adults though it used to have a children's page. The readers have many different views on different subjects and there is a page for their letters. The newspaper has to suffer with a lot of {complaints} about the M25 motorway being too noisy.
